title: IDK about anyone else...
body:
But I'm waiting a least a week to start my placements.

Y'know, to let the trolls get sorted back into Bronze 5.

replies.body: I'm Silver V now because of 4 of my junglers like to go into enemy jungle at 25% health.
Doesn't work that way. Errgame you risk a chance for a person to troll/afk you, it doesn't change because you wait. Wait too long and you risk adding smurfs to the list.
